name: Good Will Hunting
tagline: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

name: Platoon
tagline: A young recruit in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

name: A Christmas Carol
tagline: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

name: Dinosaur
tagline: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

name: The Conjuring
tagline: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

name: Click
tagline: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

name: The Green Mile
tagline: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

name: Ransom
tagline: When a rich man's son is kidnapped, he cooperates with the police at first but then tries a unique tactic against the criminals.

name: 101 Dalmatians
tagline: A woman kidnaps puppies to kill them for their fur, but various animals then gang up against her and get their revenge in slapstick fashion.

name: Godzilla
tagline: A enormous, radioactively mutated lizard runs rampant on the island of Manhattan.

name: Argo
tagline: Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1980.

name: Chicken Little
tagline: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
tagline: A quartet of mutated humanoid turtles clash with an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.

name: Patch Adams
tagline: A medical student in the 70's treats patients, illegally, using humor.

name: The Godfather
tagline: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: Wanted
tagline: A frustrated office worker learns that he is the son of a professional assassin, and that he shares his father's superhuman killing abilities.

name: Live Free or Die Hard
tagline: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

name: The Incredible Hulk
tagline: Dr. Bruce Banner, thanks to a gamma ray experiment gone wrong, transforms into a giant green-skinned hulk whenever his pulse rate gets too high. Meanwhile, a soldier uses the same technology to become an evil version of the original.

name: Identity Thief
tagline: Mild-mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless-looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.

name: Superman
tagline: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.

name: Ride Along
tagline: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top cop James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.

name: The Rock
tagline: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

name: Anger Management
tagline: Sandler plays a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger-management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.

name: Grown Ups 2
tagline: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, schizo bus drivers, drunk cops on skis, and 400 costumed party crashers sometimes crazy follows you.

name: Mission: Impossible III
tagline: Ethan Hunt comes face to face with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer while trying to keep his identity secret in order to protect his girlfriend.

name: Angels & Demons
tagline: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican.

name: Troy
tagline: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.

name: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
tagline: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

name: The Wolverine
tagline: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.

name: Bringing Down the House
tagline: When a lonely guy meets a woman on the Internet who happens to be in prison, she breaks out to be with him, and proceeds to wreak havoc on his middle-class life.

name: The Departed
tagline: An undercover state cop who has infiltrated an Irish gang and a mole in the police force working for the same mob race to track down and identify each other before being exposed to the enemy, after both sides realize their outfit has a rat.

name: Hulk
tagline: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.

name: Silver Linings Playbook
tagline: After a stint in a mental institution, former teacher Pat Solitano moves back in with his parents and tries to reconcile with his ex-wife. Things get more challenging when Pat meets Tiffany, a mysterious girl with problems of her own.

name: Minority Report
tagline: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

name: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
tagline: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

name: The Last Airbender
tagline: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
tagline: Video game adventuress Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
tagline: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

name: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
tagline: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

name: The Flintstones
tagline: In this live-action feature of the cartoon show, Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price.

name: Get Smart
tagline: Maxwell Smart, analyst for the secret spy agency CONTROL, alongside the experienced Agent 99, must prevent KAOS, an enemy agency from Russia, from bringing disaster to America.

name: American Gangster
tagline: In 1970s America, a detective works to bring down the drug empire of Frank Lucas, a heroin kingpin from Manhattan, who is smuggling the drug into the country from the Far East.

name: American Beauty
tagline: Lester Burnham, a depressed suburban father in a mid-life crisis, decides to turn his hectic life around after developing an infatuation for his daughter's attractive friend.

name: An Officer and a Gentleman
tagline: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Flight school to become an aviator, with the help of a tough gunnery sergeant and his new girlfriend.

name: Lethal Weapon 4
tagline: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with a deadly Chinese crimelord trying to get his brother out of prison.

name: The Nutty Professor
tagline: Grossly overweight Prof. Sherman Klump, desperate to lose weight takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

name: The Ring
tagline: A young journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.

name: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
tagline: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.

name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

production.name: Julia Phillips and Michael Phillips Productions

tagline: After an encounter with UFOs, a line worker feels undeniably drawn to an isolated area in the wilderness where something spectacular is about to happen.

name: Robots
tagline: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.

name: Coming to America
tagline: An African prince goes to Queens, New York City to find a wife whom he can respect for her intelligence and will.

name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
tagline: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically skilled, adolescent nobleman's daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.

name: Shutter Island
tagline: In 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.

name: Rocky IV
tagline: After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, literally destroys Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.

name: Enchanted
tagline: A classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City in a story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?

name: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
tagline: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.

name: Sweet Home Alabama
tagline: A young woman with a Southern background runs away from her husband in Alabama and reinvents herself as a New York socialite.

name: Dumb & Dumber
tagline: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.

name: 2 Fast 2 Furious
tagline: Brian O'Conner and childhood friend Roman Pearce are re-united by the FBI to bring down a Miami drug exporter in exchange for clear records.

name: Super 8
tagline: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

name: The World Is Not Enough
tagline: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

name: My Best Friend's Wedding
tagline: When a woman's long-time friend says he's engaged, she realizes she loves him herself... and sets out to get him, with only days before the wedding.

name: Smokey and the Bandit
tagline: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over county lines in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.

name: Sleepless in Seattle
tagline: A recently-widowed man's son calls a radio talk show in an attempt to find his father a partner.

name: Bee Movie
tagline: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barry's life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

name: Prometheus
tagline: A team of explorers discover a clue to the origins of mankind on Earth, leading them on a journey to the darkest corners of the universe. There, they must fight a terrifying battle to save the future of the human race.

name: Mr. Deeds
tagline: A sweet-natured, small-town guy inherits a controlling stake in a media conglomerate and begins to do business his way.

name: Safe House
tagline: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

name: The Truman Show
tagline: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a T.V. show.

name: Erin Brockovich
tagline: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

name: Ocean's Twelve
tagline: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Ocean's 11.

name: Tomorrow Never Dies
tagline: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

name: Terminator Salvation
tagline: After Skynet has destroyed much of humanity in a nuclear holocaust, a group of survivors led by John Connor struggles to keep the machines from finishing the job.

name: Charlie's Angels
tagline: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

name: Lone Survivor
tagline: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

name: The Vow
tagline: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.

name: Life of Pi
tagline: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
tagline: The most delicious event since macaroni met cheese. Inspired by the beloved children's book, the film focuses on a town where food falls from the sky like rain.

name: The Devil Wears Prada
tagline: A naive young woman comes to New York and scores a job as the assistant to one of the city's biggest magazine editors, the ruthless and cynical Miranda Priestly.

name: Something's Gotta Give
tagline: A swinger on the cusp of being a senior citizen with a taste for young women falls in love with an accomplished woman closer to his age.

name: Traffic
tagline: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is an addict.

name: City Slickers
tagline: A mid-life crisis plagued man and his friends find renewal and purpose on a cattle driving vacation.

name: The Birdcage
tagline: A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.

name: Good Morning, Vietnam
tagline: An unorthodox and irreverent DJ begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam.

name: Rango
tagline: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

name: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
tagline: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

name: Clear and Present Danger
tagline: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

name: The Hunt for Red October
tagline: In 1984, the USSR's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect, or to start a war?

name: The Bodyguard
tagline: A former Secret Service agent takes on the job of bodyguard to a pop singer, whose lifestyle is most unlike a President's.

name: Wayne's World
tagline: Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.

name: The Bourne Identity
tagline: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and without memory, then races to elude assassins and recover from amnesia.

name: Superbad
tagline: Two co-dependent high school seniors are forced to deal with separation anxiety after their plan to stage a booze-soaked party goes awry.

name: Speed
tagline: A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

name: 50 First Dates
tagline: Henry Roth is a man afraid of commitment up until he meets the beautiful Lucy. They hit it off and Henry think he's finally found the girl of his dreams, until he discovers she has short-term memory loss and forgets him the very next day.

name: Mulan
tagline: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

name: Inglourious Basterds
tagline: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

name: Seabiscuit
tagline: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

name: Four Christmases
tagline: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas Day.

name: Van Helsing
tagline: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.
